lessons.title: Prompt Engineering:  Getting the most out of your LLMs (talking to AI effectively)
Fine-tuning LLMs:  Teaching your AI new tricks (personalizing your chatbot)
Understanding Bias in AI: Identifying and mitigating unfairness (AI ethics)
Explainable AI (XAI):  Making AI decisions understandable (opening the black box)
Computer Vision Fundamentals:  Teaching AI to 'see' (image recognition)
Building a simple image classifier with TensorFlow/PyTorch
Natural Language Processing (NLP) advanced techniques: Sentiment analysis and text summarization
Time Series Analysis with AI: Forecasting the future (predicting stock prices)
Anomaly Detection: Identifying unusual patterns (fraud detection)
AI Security: Protecting your AI systems from attacks (keeping your AI safe)
MLOps:  Deploying and managing AI models in production (keeping your AI running)
Cloud Computing for AI: Leveraging cloud resources (scaling your AI)
Graph Neural Networks (GNNs):  Working with interconnected data (social networks)
Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs): Creating realistic images and videos (AI art)
Diffusion Models:  Another way to generate amazing images (AI art)
Federated Learning:  Training AI models on decentralized data (privacy-preserving AI)
Advanced Reinforcement Learning: Deep Q-Networks and Policy Gradients
Building a more complex reinforcement learning agent (robot control)
AI Ethics and Societal Impact: Responsible AI development
The Future of AI: Trends and Predictions
